author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-MIG Unmobi Technology to pay cash dividend of 0.31 yuan per 10 shares on May 10
text:
May 4 (Reuters) - MIG Unmobi Technology INC
* Says it will pay a cash dividend of 0.31 yuan per 10 shares (before tax) for 2017 to shareholders of record on May 9
* The companyâ€™s shares will be traded ex-right and ex-dividend on May 10 and the dividend will be paid on May 10
Source text in Chinese: goo.gl/fyQRvP
